response.original_title: Patrick Kim - And The Rings of Solomon
response.overview: Patrick Kim, the respected C.I.A agent is sent to Israel on an ambiguous mission to retrieve a proof of the construction of the third Jewish temple. The movie is inspired by the Patrick Kim the karate man, a beloved Israeli pulp fiction franchise from the 60's!
response.tagline: The karate man - Pat K. The American agent in worldwide scale turmoil in Israel
response.title: Patrick Kim - And The Rings of Solomon
